title: Lobby
desc: ~Insist: only on Exiled we laugh about money being stolen

Holiday Metagame.desc: Today we made a new tier called Holiday Metagame, in which holidays are represented by Pokemon.  If you have any sugestions contact me. ~ReturningAvenger

Games to Spotlight.desc: I don't feel games we have really caught much attention due to lack of knowledge spread, but we do have Rock Paper Scissors playable by /rps search and games like Tic Tac Toe playable by /ttt c (user's name you want to challenge).

User of the Week.desc: This is the third week, of choosing user of the week, I respectively award Back At My Day as this week's user of the week, for his helpfulness on the server as well as activity.  We draw the user of the week every Monday :D Stay tuned.

desc: Congratulations to Volco on getting user of the week, due to your contributions to Exiled!
Today at 9:00 PM Central we hosted a CAP tour worth 1337 bucks to celebrate Sota Higurashi's 20th birthday :3
Congratulations to Speckeldorft, you have won user of the week (sorry for the delay, I forgot about this ;~; and been busy xD)
Congratulations to The Crystal Fox for winning user of the week :D
If you have a suggestion for features/metas/Pokemon to be added in current metas you should definitely go to this thread on forums and post your ideas Suggestions Thread

This Thursday at 10 PM EST in the we will be hosting a huge reward tournament. Winner will receive a choice of 20 packs of their choice or 200 bucks. Runner-up will receive the prize that was left. Hope to see you all there ^~^

If you encounter any bugs on the Exiled Server, please do report these to me, DeathlyPlays :3, and I will attempt my best to fix any error that you provide, also if you could provide screenshots/vivid descriptions of what has occurred that would be very helpful.  Please note: I, DeathlyPlays :3, may need to ask you various questions to determine where said error occurred (i.e. what you did (ex: commands, said a certain word, used a certain feature, sent out a certain Pokemon, move, etc))  Thanks for reading this, and I hope you can join me as we make Exiled a comfortable environment for all users to enjoy

A lovely challenge where you face 15 of Mewth's meme themed teams, You need to obtain the 15 badges to progress to the Elite Four, if you can beat them then you go to the final champ. Winner gets a lovely prize by either me or death. I wish you luck on all participators.
THANKS TO VOLCO WE NOW HAVE PSUEDO PETS IN PROFILES HAVE A GLOBAL DRIVER OR HIGHER ADD YOURS

I am proud to introduce LC Mix and Mega is now available as a playable format. That magikarp you always thought was horrible in LC is now the God you wanted it to be by slapping a Lopunnite on it. That Sunkern you thought was the lowest lc bst can now be strong by slapping an Alakazite on it. So have fun battling in this new format

We are adding optional Z-Moves for people that are in SSBs or other Exiled Metagames, to enhance the true experience of playing Gen 7. If you have any questions head to the . Once you are ready to submit your Z-Crystal and Move, contact DeathlyPlays to get it added.

On January 18th, 2017 we will commemorate the loss of a dear friend of many known as Sota Higurashi, may he rest in piece. We will reward a very nice reward to whoever wins the CAP tour that will be hosted in the room :D
Project #9003 and #9004 information can be found at https://github.com/ExiledPS/Team-Exiled/blob/master/mods/fakemons/README.md enjoy :D

To gain information on the stats of a fakemon do /(fakemon name) and it will enlighten you as to the stats, as well as if you click the name that is underlined in blue after you have used the command it will open a new tab and show you the learnset etc about the Fakemons :D Hope this helps B)
We now have an official way for people to submit a Fakemon for people to have added via /fakemon then click that link and fill out the form :D
A submittion from our dear global driver, Wobbleleez, now exists, it is a Water/Steel type evolution of Octillery.  Thanks for submitting an entry Wobbleleez (aka Mr. Pasta dude) :D

Alright, so we have this exp level plugin, you gain exp by chatting in rooms, battles, etc, if you are caught spamming intentionally to gain EXP you will be reset to make this fair to all others competiting for the ladder, thanks and have a great day

Valentines is within minutes for some so I should go ahead and announce we WILL be hosting a Valentine's event being a Holiday Metagame tournament, hope you guys will be here it starts at 8:30 PM Central. Spread the love and the news of this event, the reward for winner is either 250 exp or 50 bucks, runner-up gets whatever the winner doesn't choose.
Thanks to Volco we now have gangs to join a gang do /gang join, (gang name).  The gang choices are Rocket, Galactic, Magma, Aqua, Plasma, Flare, Skull.

Hello, it is me, Bamd. You might be thinking "Where the hell is Insist?". Well I forced him to let me make news or else I would spam him with evil emotes. Anyways I made a new tier called Advance Wars. It's still beta so later on it will have more units, types and moves. Have a shit day shitheads.

Squad is back and well the CSS is kinda black?  Eh, that's besides the point!  We have one mission, which is to make the users on here have an amazing time!  As celebration of the Squad returning we will have an event on 4/7/2017 (Friday), at 8:00 PM Central.
hey everyone! Stellation here, just wanted to let you all know that there will some new meta games created by me. So if you want to try them out, go ahead.
